result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.html: bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ponchtml: bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i nua-eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am nua-eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i nua-eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am nua-eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i nua-eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am nua-eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
